description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 2a, line 3. Physical description: 18 lines per page; written in casual nastaʻliq in black on machine-made paper. Rubrication and catchwords. Origin: 8 Rajab 1267 H [9 May 1851], by Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad (leaf 254b). Incipit: نحمدك ىا من اوضح لنا مناهج الوصول الى علم الاصول
author: Ḥarfūshī, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī, -1649
abstract: Commentary on the work of al-Shahīd al-Awwal, completed in Iṣfahān, 6 Jumādá I, 1055 H (leaf 254b).
extent: 255 leaves : paper ; 213 x 168 (155 x 101) mm bound to 213 x 171 mm
provenance: On leaf 1a, owner's note of Muḥammad Bāqir ibn Aḥmad al-Ḥusaynī dated 1333 [1914 or 1915].
dlme_provenance_en: On leaf 1a, owner's note of Muḥammad Bāqir ibn Aḥmad al-Ḥusaynī dated 1333 [1914 or 1915].
creator: Ḥarfūshī, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī, -1649
حرفوشي، محمد بن علي، 1649،
subject: Shahīd al-Awwal, Muḥammad ibn Makkī, 1333 or 1334-1380—Qawāʻid wa-al-fawāʼid.
binding_note: Limp, gold-painted leather with marbled paper doublures.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
